IcecladMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
IcecladMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

IcecladMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
IcecladMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
IcecladMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

IcecladMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
IcecladMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

IcecladMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
IcecladMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !icecladmod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

IcecladMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
IcecladMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !icecladmod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

IcecladMod:IceCube.NAME: Ice Cube
IcecladMod:IceCube.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL *Exhaust. NL If this is in your hand at the end of your turn, gain !B! Block.

IcecladMod:CastSpear.NAME: Cast Spear
IcecladMod:CastSpear.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Spear to the top of your draw pile.
IcecladMod:CastSpear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Spear+ to the top of your draw pile.

IcecladMod:BrittleBlade.NAME: Brittle Blade
IcecladMod:BrittleBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add an *Ice *Cube to your hand. NL *Exhaust.

IcecladMod:Absorb.NAME: Absorb
IcecladMod:Absorb.DESCRIPTION: Deal *50% of your missing HP as damage NL ( !D! damage ) NL If Lethal, heal !M! HP. NL *Exhaust.

IcecladMod:Deploy.NAME: Deploy
IcecladMod:Deploy.DESCRIPTION: Add an *Ice *Cube to your hand. NL Next turn, add !M! more *Ice *Cubes. NL *Exhaust.

IcecladMod:CubeKiller.NAME: Cube Killer
IcecladMod:CubeKiller.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an *Ice *Cube, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

IcecladMod:HighVelocity.NAME: High Velocity
IcecladMod:HighVelocity.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. All icecladmod:Brisk cards in your hand are free this turn.

IcecladMod:FloorIt.NAME: Floor It
IcecladMod:FloorIt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Lethal, add icecladmod:Brisk to a random card in your deck. *Exhaust.

IcecladMod:Smash.NAME: Smash
IcecladMod:Smash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal additional damage for the amount of icecladmod:Icicle they have and remove it.
